newsitem.title: USA: Orange County ex-assistant treasurer found guilty.
newsitem.headline: Orange County ex-assistant treasurer found guilty.

text.p: A jury on Friday found former Orange County, Calif., assistant treasurer Matthew Raabe guilty of felony charges stemming from the largest municipal bankruptcy in U.S. history.

The jury of six men and six women said Raabe -- a central figure in the county's bankruptcy crisis -- was guilty on all five felony counts, including the misappropriation of public funds and lying to investors.
